message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I believe this is a good starting point for a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your fairness, but I think a 55/45 split in my favor is more equitable. We're both taking a hit from inflation, so it's important we work together to get the best outcome possible.

I understand your position, Bob. Let's meet in the middle with a 50/50 split.  This way, we both get a fair share despite the impact of inflation. It's time we end this game and both walk away with something.
